data.title: Oracle Training Courses and Seminars
data.meta_description: TrainUp.com is your one-stop source for the best oracle training courses nationwide. Start your search now and browse more than 7 live instructor-led oracle training classes near you, from the industry's best oracle training companies such as SkillSoft, Global Knowledge, and PrepLogic, Inc.. TrainUp.com also lists more than 180 self-paced online oracle training courses, micro-learning videos, and eLearning bundles. If you are in need of group oracle training solutions for your team, visit our on-site oracle training page to request a training quote today. We will bring the best instructor to you!
data.text:
What is Oracle training?

Oracle, one of the top database management systems used today and was created by Oracle Corporation back in 1987. Oracle Database training will provide you with the opportunity to learn how to install, configure, create, and troubleshoot using Oracle’s easy to use relational database management system. There are several training options for you to choose from that offer comprehensive curriculum to meet your Oracle training needs. By focusing your learning on running online transaction processing, data warehousing, and mixed database workloads, you will be able to master the advanced concepts of the fully relational database known as Oracle.

Which Oracle course is best?

Oracle Database training will provide you with the opportunity to learn how to install, configure, create, and troubleshoot using Oracle’s easy to use relational database management system. There are several training options for you to choose from that offer 18c, 12c, 11g, and comprehensive SQL curriculum to meet your Oracle training needs. Finding the right Oracle training program that works for your time, schedule, and budget is the essential first step. You want a high quality, in-depth program that prepares you to master the advanced concepts in your training. There are reputable training providers who offer the Oracle curriculum you need.

How can I learn Oracle database administrator?

Becoming an Oracle Database Administrator training has several routes, depending on how much Oracle, virtualization, ASM, or operating system knowledge and experience you have. There are several training options for you to choose from that offer a comprehensive route to becoming an Oracle Database Administrator. Finding the right DBA training program that works for your time, schedule, and budget is the essential first step. The high-quality programs will prepare you to an efficient Oracle Database Administrator, but you will also need to become knowledgeable on advanced concepts in storage and application clusters.

How do I prepare for the Oracle certification?

Passing the Oracle Certification Exam will maximize your skills as a Certified Oracle professional. You will need to study the material, exam topics, and details available on Oracle’s education website, Oracle University. There are also certified training providers that will equally prepare you for the level of detail that you will need to know to pass the exam. To prepare for the Oracle Certification Exam, complete the necessary training and register to take an exam. With a passing score, you will have the competitive edge and credibility in Oracle technology.

How useful is Oracle certification?

Many Oracle certification programs prepare you to take the certification exam, but there are other perks to taking Oracle certification courses. The knowledge, skills, and concepts taught in Oracle certification courses offers you the tools you can put in place immediately. As a new programmer, you are given the tools to pursue future goals of increased knowledge, confidence, income, and career recognition. Whether you are enrolling in an Oracle certification program to become a Junior Associate, Associate, Professional, Master, Expert, or Specialist, you are building valuable skills to succeed.

How do I become Oracle Cloud certified?

Oracle Cloud Certification Programs require time and dedication to learning the fundamental skills for supporting Oracle products on a professional level. Many Oracle Cloud Certification Programs prepare you to take the Oracle Cloud Infrastructure Architect Associate Exam, which is designed for professionals responsible for designing infrastructure solutions. To obtain your Oracle Cloud Infrastructure Certification, complete the necessary coursework, register to take an exam, pass with a score of 65% or above, and you are provided a competitive edge and credibility in cloud technology.

How much does it cost to get Oracle certification?

Oracle Certification Programs require time and dedication to learning the fundamental skills for supporting Oracle products on a professional level. Many Oracle certification programs prepare you to take the certification exam, but there are other perks to taking Oracle certification courses. To obtain your Oracle Certification, after completing the necessary coursework, you can register to take an exam. Split into two categories, you can take the Oracle Database SQL exam or Advanced PL/SQL exam for $245 USD, for a total of $490 USD for both skills exams.

How long do Oracle certifications last?

Oracle Certifications surprisingly do not expire. Many Oracle certification programs prepare you to take a certain version of Oracle and most people stick to the most relative or current version. Although Oracle certifications do not expire, each version of Oracle has a lifespan and expiration date. The concepts taught in Oracle certification courses offers you the tools you can put in place immediately with increased knowledge, confidence, and career recognition. Whether you are enrolling in an Oracle certification program to become a Junior Associate, Associate, Professional, Master, Expert, or Specialist, you are building valuable foundational Oracle skills.
